desc: Build a dark-themed fitness tracker UI showing steps, distance, and calories burned.
Create a simple chat app UI with sent and received messages and input area.
Design a compact weather widget showing location, temperature, and conditions.
Create a bold and simple event landing page with a call to action button.
Design a clean and readable blog post layout with title, author info, and content.
A clean, grid-based recipe listing with images, descriptions, and action buttons.
A sleek, dark-themed music player with cover art, song info, controls, and progress bar.
A light task manager layout with a task list, add button, and completion styling.
A travel booking interface with search fields and destination cards.
A modern portfolio grid showcasing recent projects with images and short descriptions.
